io.sphere.sdk.commands

Interface Command<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the result of the command, most likely the updated entity without expanded references
    All Superinterfaces:
    SphereRequest<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CreateCommand<T>, DeleteByIdCommand<T>, DeleteCommand<T>, UpdateCommand<T>, UpdateCommandDsl<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CartCreateCommand, CartDeleteByIdCommand, CartUpdateCommand, CategoryCreateCommand, CategoryDeleteByIdCommand, CategoryUpdateCommand, ChannelCreateCommand, ChannelDeleteByIdCommand, CommandImpl, CreateCommandImpl, CustomerChangePasswordCommand, CustomerCreateCommand, CustomerCreateEmailTokenCommand, CustomerCreateTokenCommand, CustomerDeleteByIdCommand, CustomerGroupCreateCommand, CustomerGroupDeleteByIdCommand, CustomerGroupUpdateCommand, CustomerPasswordResetCommand, CustomerSignInCommand, CustomerUpdateCommand, CustomerVerifyEmailCommand, CustomObjectCustomJsonMappingUpsertCommand, CustomObjectDeleteByContainerAndKeyCommand, CustomObjectUpsertCommand, DeleteByIdCommandImpl, ExperimentalProductImageUploadCommand, OrderFromCartCreateCommand, OrderUpdateCommand, ProductCreateCommand, ProductDeleteByIdCommand, ProductTypeCreateCommand, ProductTypeDeleteByIdCommand, ProductUpdateCommand, ShippingMethodCreateCommand, ShippingMethodDeleteByIdCommand, ShippingMethodUpdateCommand, TaxCategoryCreateCommand, TaxCategoryDeleteByIdCommand, UpdateCommandDslImpl, ZoneCreateCommand, ZoneDeleteByIdCommand, ZoneUpdateCommand

    public interface Command<T>
extends SphereRequest<T>
    A command represents a request to update the state of SPHERE.io entities.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface io.sphere.sdk.client.SphereRequest

        canHandleResponse, httpRequestIntent, resultMapper
